change.changenote: Schedule BEFORE amended by BC Reg 128/2016, effective June 3, 2016.

bcl:indent1.in:em: The Schedule is exempt from publication and may be inspected during regular office hours at the offices of the Commercial Vehicle Safety and Enforcement Branch, 3A - 940 Blanshard Street, Victoria, B.C. V8W 2H3 or viewed online through all public libraries within B.C. and at all Service BC Centres. A subscription for online access can be obtained through Queen's Printer to access the manual for an annual fee of $25 at the following link: http://www.vsis.ca. Printed copies can also be ordered from Queen's Printer at http://www.crownpub.bc.ca.

change.changenote: Schedule BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 24/2018, effective March 1, 2018.

bcl:indent1.in:em: The Schedule is exempt from publication and may be viewed during regular office hours at the offices of the Commercial Vehicle Safety and Enforcement Branch, 3A - 940 Blanshard Street, Victoria, B.C. V8W 2H3. A subscription for online access can be obtained through Queen's Printer to access the manual for an annual fee of $25 at the following link: http://www.vsis.ca. Printed copies can also be ordered from Queen's Printer at www.crownpub.bc.ca.
